Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam, eaque ipsa quae ab illo inventore veritatis et quasi architecto beatae vitae dicta sunt explicabo. Nemo enim ipsam voluptatem quia voluptas sit aspernatur aut odit aut fugit, sed quia consequuntur magni dolores eos qui ratione voluptatem sequi nesciunt. Neque porro quisquam est, qui dolorem ipsum quia dolor sit amet, consectetur, adipisci velit, sed quia non numquam eius modi tempora incidunt ut labore et dolore magnam aliquam quaerat voluptatem. Ut enim ad minima veniam, quis nostrum exercitationem ullam corporis suscipit laboriosam, nisi ut aliquid ex ea commodi consequatur? Quis autem vel eum iure reprehenderit qui in ea voluptate velit esse quam nihil molestiae consequatur, vel illum qui dolorem eum fugiat quo voluptas nulla pariatur?

But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure. To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it? But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences, or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure?

But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure. Lisage oma ülesannetele projekte, et salvestada ja korraldada ülesandeid ühiste teemade järgi ning kasutada neid tulevikus uuesti ning saate muuta projekti lemmikuks või peidetuks.
Add projects to your tasks to save and organize the tasks around common themes and reuse them in the future and you can make a project favorite or hidden.
Lisa tööülesandele teema. Korduvaid teemasid saad hõlpsalt tulevikus uuesti kasutada. Teemad ja erinevad ülesannete loendid hõlbustavad ülesannete jälgimist ja päeva korraldamist.
Add topics to your tasks to save and organise tasks around common themes and reuse them in future.

Määra tööülesande lõpetatuks ("Done") märkimise reeglid. Kui märgid linnukese Pildi (Image) ja/või kommentaari (Comment) ette, ei saa ülesannet enne tehtuks märkida, kui lisatud on pilt ja/või kommentaar.

Ask for set requirements to be filled before marking a task as Done. Put a check mark to necessary completion requirements to set how a task must be completed.

Image requires uploading a photo before marking the task done.

Comment requires adding a comment before marking the task as done.
Mis on To me - Ongoing staatus taskil?
Sulle määratud tööülesanded, mis ei ole veel valmis. Ülesande saad vajadusel sellest loendist kas peita (vajuta "Hide") või märkida tehtuks (vajuta "Done").
What is the To me - Ongoing state for task?
Task assigned to you, that you’re working on and can be changed to Done or Hiddened.
Mis on To me - Done staatus taskil?
Loend sulle määratud tööülesannetest, mis on lõpetatud.
What is the To me - Done state for task?
Task assigned to you that you have completed.
Mis on From me - Ongoing staatus taskil?
Loend sinu poolt teistele määratud tööülesannetest, mis on praegu töös.
What is the From me - Ongoing state for task?
Task you have assigned to someone else that has not yet been completed.
Mis on From me - Done staatus taskil?
Loend sinu poolt teistele määratud tööülesannetest, mis on lõpetatud ("Done").
What is the From me - Done state for task?
Task you have assigned to someone who has completed the task. Can be changed to Hidden.
Mis on Hidden - Ongoing staatus taskil?

Loend töös olevatest peidetud ülesannetest. Peida oma rakenduses ära (vajuta Ongoing loendis "Hide") näiteks ülesanded, mida ei saa praegu lõpetada või mis pole hetkel nii tähtsad. Nii on sul "Ongoing" loendis selge ülevaade kõige olulisematest ja kiirematest ülesannetest. Kui keegi lisab peidetud ülesande alla pildi või kommentaari, siis ilmub ülesanne automaatselt sinu töös olevate ülesannete loendisse tagasi.
What is the Hidden - Ongoing state for task?

Keep your task list organised and hide ongoing tasks that cannot be completed or are not relevant at the moment. Hold your finger on a task (in mini view) and choose hide. Any activity like adding a photo or a comment under that task automatically makes it show up on your Ongoing task list again.
Mis on Hidden - Done staatus taskil?

Tehtud ja peidetud ülesannete loend. Et hoida lahus oma tegemata ja tegemist vajavaid ülesandeid, hoia sulle määratud ülesannete loendis näpp ülesandel ja vajuta "Hide". Tehtud ülesandeid näed edaspidi "Hidden-Done" saki all.
What is the Hidden - Done state for task?
Keep your task list organised and hide Done tasks. Hold your finger on a task (in mini view) and choose hide. You can then see these tasks under a Hidden tab.
Mis on Hidden - Canceled staatus taskil?
Loend tühistatud ülesannetest. Siin näed nii sinu poolt loodud ja tühistatud kui sulle määratud ja määraja poolt tühistatud tööülesandeid. Ceibro lisab kõik tühistatud ülesanded automaatselt siia.
What is the Hidden - Canceled state for task?
The list of tasks that you have created and cancelled and tasks that have been assigned to you and cancelled by the task owner.
Sa ei ole veel lisanud kontakte oma telefonist.
Vajuta "Enable auto-sync", et sünkroniseerida oma telefoni kontaktid oma Ceibro kontaktidega.
Seems like you haven\'t added any contacts from your phone.
Enable auto-sync to synchronize all your contacts to your Ceibro.
Või vali ise kontaktid oma telefonist, keda soovid Ceibro kontaktidesse lisada.
Or select contacts manually to add to your Ceibro.
Tasks assigned to you that you’re working on will also appear in your inbox as a notification of the latest updates.
Teile määratud ülesanded, mille kallal töötate, kuvatakse teie postkastis ka märguandina viimastest uuendustest.
Näib, et te pole oma kontaktidele luba andnud.
Andke seadetes kontaktidele luba, et lugeda ja sünkroonida kõiki oma kontakte automaatselt või käsitsi.
Seems like you haven\'t granted permission to your contacts.
Allow contacts permission in settings, to read and synchronize all your contacts automatically or manually.
Näib, et teie telefoni kontaktide loendis pole ühtegi kontakti.
Salvesta enda telefoni vähemalt üks kontakt ja ceibro sünkroonib selle siia nimekirja.
Seems like you don\'t have any contacts in your phone contact list.
Save at least one contact on your phone and ceibro will sync it to this list.
